article: Nicola's Love for Her Violin Can love between partners with a 237-year age gap lead to the perfect match ? Nicola Benedetti thinks so. She _ Nicola is from Scotland and _ playing the violin when she was four years old. _ , it was not something her parents _ her do. She went with her sister to violin lessons and _ it and improved very quickly. "There are so many different things I am fond of about the _ ," she said. "I can't really _ it but I love giving live performances, I like the feeling of playing and communicating with the _ . I love the feeling of the violin under my chin ." However, playing violin six hours a day is not a/an _ job. "I usually _ outside, it can be upset. The house is right on the _ and I can see others having fun _ I'm on my own."[: _ ] Although practising is sometimes lonely, Nicola _ felt she was lucky. "You can't have _ . I am really lucky to do what I love doing," she said. Her _ paid off . Nicola won BBC Young Musician of the Year in 2004 at 16. Besides her performing and recording activities, Nicola is a/an _ of UNICEF . She said that she would travel to Lesotho in southern Africa at the end of this year to help poor kids there.
